alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 30 at 1:06PM MST until February 01 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ TONIGHT TO NOON CST /11 AM MST/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of southeast New Mexico and southwest and western Texas. * WHEN...From midnight CST /11 PM MST/ tonight to noon CST /11 AM MST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. In New Mexico, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-432-4269. In Texas, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-452-9292.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County
